Headline: #51 51st Temporary  Eastbound Reroute near 47th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: EB 51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, State, 47th and Wentworth, due to street blockage near 47th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, State, 47th and Wentworth, due to street blockage near 47th/Wentworth.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
